page.title: 19A day in the life of Stuart
page.content: I wake up at{7.00}.I get washed & dressed.I have cereal or toast for breakfast.When I've finished I go over to my friends house until{8.45}A.M. Then I go to school.We have assembly then the first two lessons then it's play time(a short play).Then we carry on the lessons until dinner time comes.I have sandwiches but most people have school dinners.At dinner play I play mini tennis or cricket then at{1.30}we come in & have the last two lessons until last play at 2.30 Then at{3.30}I go home & get into my playing clothes. I go to my friends again until{5.00}.I have dinner & when I've finished I go to my friend{ {Christopher's}house and we play on his {Computer}until{7.00}.I go home & watch {Television}until{8.30}.Bed-time & then the next day.
